name: Brian Gitonga
bio: As a passionate Sales professional in this role, Brian bring strong business acumen and enjoy collaborating with the Operations Team and Technical team to execute business development practices such as generating leads, building sales quotes, building PMA's,reviewing RFQ bids and conducting on-site inspection estimates for Projects.

name: Victor Githui
bio: Experienced Software Engineer specializing in UI/UX Design and Web development, recognized for problem-solving and customer satisfaction. Highly organized, trustworthy, and adept at managing multiple priorities. Proficient across diverse industries such as Point of Sale, Agriculture, Mobility, E-commerce, Motorsports, Human Resources, Entertainment, and more. Additionally he is a self-taught and passionate filmmaker, photographer, and technical trainer with expertise in producing, directing, editing, cinematography, and photography. Adaptable and committed to delivering exceptional results.
